Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: Probably we chose the wrong pizza, but it was way below the average. The pizza didnâ€™t have much taste, the spicy sauce did the job. You donâ€™t get what you pay for.

Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: We went here around eleven o'clock and we ordered a pizza but the guy behind the bar was annoyed that we ordered one after. Then after the two pizzas, we wanted one more slice which he didn't warmup because he was sick of us. Kind of sad you go around like that with the customers.

Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: Surely there are no words required... just look at my grin!?! Haha, one of the nicest,  biggest pizzas I've had the pleasure to devour whilst in Amsterdam! The pizza roll in particular was a nice surprise and so tasty! Great introduction â€¦

Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: I had a simple Margherita pizza that was relatively good, but the reason this is getting 4 stars is because of the restaurant's comprehensive allergy menu. It is so easily accessible and not only have they written the common allergens for â€¦

Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: Pizza top, but atmosphere is very dirty. Seating places are damaged and itâ€™s really not a place to stay.

Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: Friendly Staff, I tried their Pesto Pasta which was delicious, very flavoursome and a decent portion size too. Pizza by the size, and whole if you want. Recommended for a good meal whilst out.

Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: Great pizza. We ordered pasta and even though they shut the kitchen for pasta they made it for us any way. Although a little dirty as in the seating area. But food was great.

Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: They are the worst pizza's ever because they look like they're up in the display for many hours. Me and my wife and friend all got sick hours later. The owner lied and said we didn't get poisoned there. Addiionally, the toilets are â€¦

Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: My husband thinks they have the best pizza in the world, but I have been living in Italy for years so I can't be totally agreed with him on that. Any how, many times we have came here to eat after we came out of coffee shops, zero photo was â€¦

Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: Excellent pizza, very tasteful, and great service with friendly bilingual staff. However, when two employees behind the counter start fighting it does make me feel a little awkward..The place is made for takeaway so seating is limited. Also the place is quite noisy.

Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: Pizza was nice the staff was s little hesitant mixed up the order and forgot about some sides. Very limited tables inside so more of a take out place not too friendly for larger tourist groups. But it is very cheap if your looking for a quick bite to eat on the go.

Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: Pizza was as expected, wings weren't bad. Unfortunately was in range of a scam/phishing wifi hotspot, but there's not much they can do about it. Food was served pretty quick.

Name: New York Pizza
Review Text:
Poor staff with no manners.
We waited 30 min for our poor rasting pizzas.
You have to pay 50cents for the restrooms.
Definitely not coming back here

Name: New York Pizza

Name: New York Pizza

Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: Went there yesterday during pride , when I came to pay I was charged an extra  euro on each slice, when I asked how come they just told me that 'just because', it was not even written anywhere to let customers know. Real sly
